Class att.grappa.InvertedTrapezium 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----att.grappa.DrawObject
           |
           +----att.grappa.DrawNode
                   |
                   +----att.grappa.Trapezium
                           |
                           +----att.grappa.InvertedTrapezium
public class InvertedTrapezium
extends Trapezium
The DrawObject to use for rendering nodes whose shape is an invertedtrapezium. The class is simply a Trapezium whose orientation has been set to 180.0.

Version:
1.1, 30 Sep 1999; Copyright 1996 - 1999 by AT&T Corp.
Author:
John Mocenigo, Research @ AT&T Labs

InvertedTrapezium()
Construct an inverted-trapezium-shaped DrawObject for nodes.

 public InvertedTrapezium()
Construct an inverted-trapezium-shaped DrawObject for nodes.
